message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and believe it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This product offers a lot of value, and I'm confident you'll see a return on your investment.
I'm still very interested in the product, but $17,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
